seed_pair.target: If you can speak more slowly that would be great.
seed_pair.known: Si puedes hablar más lentamente, eso sería excelente.

S0085: no conozco a | esas personas | conozco a esas personas
I don't know | those people | know those people
S0087: son personas | que no conozco | personas que no conozco
they are people | that I don't know | people I don't know
S0088: no estoy preparado | no estoy preparado para | para hablar con | personas que no conozco | todavía
I'm not ready | I'm not ready to | to talk to | people I don't know | yet
S0089: pienso que | he hecho | he hecho mucho | en un breve tiempo | un breve tiempo
I think that | I've done | I've done a lot | in a short time | a short time
